properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the file, without path information.

properties.name: fullPath
properties.description: The full path of the file, including the name.

properties.name: lastModifiedDate
properties.description: The date and time when the file was last modified.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the file, in bytes.

properties.name: getFormatData
properties.description: Retrieves the format information of the media file.
